common.botc_online: Jolly Roger on the High Seas

cameras.label: Spyglasses
cameras.title: If spyglasses be on in this voyage

difficulty.label: Waters
difficulty.title: How salty yer sea legs be

grimoire.label: Map Sight
grimoire.title: If onlookers can see the map

streaming.label: Journey viewable for onlookers from afar
streaming.title: This journey will be seen by onlookers from afar as it unfolds

subscription.title: Ye need to hand over yer doubloons to hop on board

travellers.label: Landlubbers
travellers.title: If'n landlubbers be let on board

common.title: Jolly Roger in yer Own Home
common.trademark: "Blood on the Clocktower" be a trademark belongin' to Steven Medway and The Pandemonium Institute.

abilities.open-eyes: Keep Yer Peepers Peeled/Drop Yer Peepers

grimoire.demon: Beast o' the sea|Beasts o' the sea
grimoire.loric: Great Tale o' the Sea|Great Tales o' the Sea

main-menu.change_icon: Click if'n ye want to pick a new icon
main-menu.error_audio: Yer messenger said ye can't {0}. Check here to start talkin'.
main-menu.error_audio2: playing yer mateys at ye, like it or not
main-menu.error_audio3: Mayhap ye should {0} if ye be using firey foxes if ye want to hear yer mateys.
main-menu.grim_access: The Captain let you see the Map
main-menu.grim_request: An onlooker wants to see yer map
main-menu.night_info_text: The Captain roused ye this moon!
main-menu.prompt_clear_player: Are ye sure ye want to burn yer copy o' the map?
main-menu.prompt_clear_st: This will burn everyone's maps. Are ye sure?
main-menu.prompt_timer_text: Name yer hourglass if ye like and add some sand:
main-menu.prompt_vacate_text: Ye be on a voyage, are ye sure ye want to jump overboard?
main-menu.session_expires: There be no Scallywag tier pirates aboard, ship may sink at {0}.
main-menu.to_night: Send the crew to their bunks
main-menu.translation: Teach us to speak proper pirate

announcement.description: What do ye need to say?
announcement.error: Yer messenger pigeon got shot down
announcement.title: Sound the alarm

error.avatar_generic: We can't make that yer portrait right now.
error.avatar_pixel: Yer portrait was to big to fit in the hold. We only have space for one that be 4000x4000.
error.avatar_size: Yer booty be too big. Make it less than 5MB and we'll talk.
error.avatar_type: Yer booty doesn't look like a portrait to me!
error.chat2_text: We can't seem to let ye talk here
error.chat2_title: I think we sunk yer messenger pigeon
error.chat_text:
We had an issue, we'll try to fix it... 
Ye got this message: {0}
error.chat_title: Yer messenger pigeon got shot down
error.connection: Ye can't get on the seas
error.create_generic: Avast, we couldn't set yer boat to sail.
error.create_rate_limit: Ye'll have to take a wee pause afore ye buy another boat.
error.create_session_exists: There be a boat with that name.
error.end: We couldn't bring ye in to port safe
error.eyes_close: Ye can't rest yer blinkers right now, sorry
error.eyes_open: Ye gotta keep yer blinkers shut for a second, sorry
error.kick: Ye can't throw them overboard right now, try harder
error.link_text: Yer messenger pigeon got shot down so we dont know how much ye paid. Please try again.
error.link_title: Yer messenger pigeon got shot down
error.loading_text: Something be wrong with our app data. Our servers be centuries out of date. The page will reload.
error.missing_edition: This ship be sailing on an uncharted sea.
error.missing_roles: We couldn't find yer counterfit stations. Make sure ye have them before ye join. Yer missing: {0}
error.missing_roles_title: We couldn't get yer counterfit stations
error.move_player: Ye can't budge that matey, try harder
error.offline: Ye be gettin' no response from yer fleet
error.remove_player: We couldn't get them off the ship
error.running: Ye can't change that right now
error.sending_roles: Yer crew didn't get their jobs
error.server2_text:
Ye've sailed into rough waters, we'll try to get ye back... 
Error message: {0}
error.server_change: We couldn't change the tide for yer messages-in-bottles
error.server_text: We hadn't heard from ye in too long and we thought ye'd gone.
error.server_title: There be an issue with yer ocean
error.session_banned: Sling yer hook, yer not welcome.
error.session_full: If anyone else gets aboard she'll sink!
error.session_locked:
No one else can get aboard.
Unless ye already be on this voyage, heave off and find yer own ship.
error.session_not_found: That ship be lost at sea.
error.session_public: Ye can't get aboard a merchant's ship, stick to yer private ships.
error.session_rejoin: Ye can't get aboard this ship right now.
error.session_subscription: Hand over yer doubloons to get aboard this ship.
error.session_unverified: We need to be sure yer a real pirate before ye can join merchants' ships.
error.start: We're not ready to set sail yet
error.subscription: Ye need to have handed over yer doubloons
error.subscription_text: Ye need to have handed over yer doubloons to the admirals to get aboard.
error.subscription_title: Ye haven't given the admirals yer doubloons
error.video_text: Yer messenger told us ye told them ye don't want to see people, so send our messenger away to open their spyglasses.

prompt.chat_text: The ocean be rough in {0}, but {1} might be calmer. Should we set sail?
prompt.join_text: What's the ship ye want to board?
prompt.leave_text: Are ye sure ye want to leave this ship and see who else be sailing?
prompt.leave_text_player: Are ye sure ye want to jump overboard and see what other ships there be?
prompt.pronouns_text: How do ye wish to be hailed?
prompt.pronouns_title: How ye wish to be hailed
prompt.storyteller_text: Do ye wish to be Captain o' this ship and check the map?
prompt.username_text: What do ye wish to be called?

dialogue.terms: If ye sail with the Jolly Roger, ye need to have read and agreed to these statues and codes:
dialogue.terms_confirm: Ye, I've read them and I agree wi' them.

edition.clear_description: This will burn everyone's maps. Are ye sure?
edition.custom_placeholder: Bearing for the Ledger o' yer own making
edition.custom_text: Tell Jason yer bearing to the Ledger o' yer own making
edition.custom_title: Get Ledger o' yer Own Making
edition.error_character_text: This Ledger has over 200 stations. Ye don't need so many!
edition.error_custom: Couldn't get yer ledger o' yer own making to work
edition.error_loading: Couldn't get these stations on board: {0}
edition.error_script_text: We got yer ledger working, but with snags. We think it has some lines that shouldn't be there, so says Jason's tome on ledgers o' yer own making.
edition.error_size_text: Yer ledger be too big! It be {0}MB, we can only carry {1}MB.
edition.homebrew_description: These counterfeit stations have portraits which mayhap be dangerous. Ye can choose to see them if ye adjust the rigging.
edition.title: Pick yer sea:

help.button_stop: Stop giving the carpenter yer news
help.session_debug: Are ye encountering rough seas? Shiver me timbers! Let us know what be troubling ye:
help.session_debug2: Yer journeys are being watched by our well drilled seagulls. Ye can tell 'em to fly away here or by reloading yer magic box.
help.text1: We still be makin' changers to yer ocean (version {version}).
help.text2: Ye can tell us how ye feel through the {0} page or {1}. Ye can change yer pirate particulars {2}. If ye want to try journeying face to face, try {3}.

reminder.custom_text: Add yer own memberin' mark to add to {0}
reminder.title: Add Memberin' Mark to {0}

roles.title: Pick the stations for {0}
roles.warning: Avast! Some o' these stations change yer other stations! Ye need to sort this out yerself.

settings.background_text: Gimme the bearings to yer trimmings, or gimme none to abandon yer trimmings.
settings.css_confirm: Arr, I be sure of what I be doing, let me tweak the sails
settings.css_confirm2: Are ye sure that ye want to keep this look? If ye're not, we'll cast 'em into the sea.
settings.css_text: Ye can change how yer journey looks with a witchcraft called "a Custom CSS file" or the "CSS code" itself. We're not too sure what that be, to be honest with ye, it sounds like witchcraft from another time, so if ye do that, even if ye got this code from another matey, ye accept that The Pandemonium Institute be not to answer for it if ye load "malicious code" which mayhap stop ye from journeying with us again.
settings.image_text: Are ye sure ye want to see portraits made by yer mateys? If they poison the grog or the ledger the can mayhap find ye through yer IP address! The Pandemonium Institute has no say over what portraits blaggards on the seas bring on board.

bigwig.text: Every accused matey picks a matey: until ayes, only they can talk & they be me addled that the accused be a good'un or they join the locker, mayhaps.
bigwig.title: Fancy Coat

focus.text: Everyone listens to the accused matey.
focus.title: Listen to the accused

phases.text: Only the accuser and the accused can talk.
phases.title: Accusal only

regular.text: Everyone may say whatever they like.
regular.title: Normal

settings.patreon_link: Show us the doubloons ye've given us
settings.patreon_perks: Avast! Ye can only pick yer own portraits and have fancy flags if ye pay us {0}!
settings.patreon_perks2: Put up yer coin on Patreon
settings.patreon_update: Prove ye've paid yer doubloons on Patreon
settings.setting_alignment: Show loyalties on the upper deck
settings.setting_auto_gain: Let us balance how loud ye be
settings.setting_avatars: Show Portraits / Spyglasses on Upper Deck
settings.setting_english: Hear the tongue of the future
settings.setting_mute_audio: Put Yer Fingers In Yer Ears
settings.setting_player_sound: Matey: Hear the Captain rouse you
settings.setting_private_cams: Peep the Spyglasses of the Alone
settings.setting_reminders: Build a Pile of Memberin' Marks
settings.setting_reveal: Show Mateys When They See The Map
settings.setting_st_whisper: Captain: Let Bunkmates Waggle Their Tongues
settings.setting_tutorial: Show How to Row the Boat
settings.setup: Got a problem wi' yer spyglass or talkin' tube?
settings.shortcut_escape: If ye don't like yer picks, escape
settings.shortcut_record: Push the knob ye want to work {0}
settings.shortcut_reset_confirm: Do ye want to change 'em all back? Ye can't go back from this.
settings.shortcut_touch_text: Help with touchin' like strokin' up and down

shortcuts.acceptChat1: Let the first person talk to ye
shortcuts.acceptChat2: Let the second person talk to ye
shortcuts.acceptChat3: Let the third person talk to ye

settings.title: Boat Rigging

setup.audio_error: Ye got ringing in yer ears
setup.mic_cam_blocked: We can't see ye or hear ye
setup.text: We'll try to see ye and hear ye if ye touch {0}. If there be problems, we'll tell ye.
setup.title: Get yer spyglass out and start talkin'

cards.demon: This be the Beast o' the Sea

signal.player_text: Pick a matey by drawing an X on the map.
signal.prompt_custom_player: What do ye want to ask the Captain?
signal.prompt_custom_st: What do ye want to tell the matey?
signal.title: Rouse {0}

user.error: We couldn't get their pirate details.
user.prompt_kick: Are ye sure ye want to throw {0} overboard?
user.prompt_st:
Are ye sure ye want to make {0} Captain?
If they say aye, they'll be the Captain and can see the Map.
user.title: Pirate details

users.chat_connection: How ye be talkin' wi' yer mateys

verification.code_sent: We sent ye some numbers to yer cabin, tell us them so as we can trust that ye be real!
verification.error_402: There be something wrong wi' yer cabin, do you have one for the long haul?
verification.error_403: Yer cabin be assigned to another pirate! If we be befuddled, tell us at {0}.
verification.error_404: Yer numbers be wrong or too old. We'll give ye another go.
verification.error_assigned: Yer cabin belongs to another pirate, pick another cabin.
verification.error_cooldown: Avast! Ye be trying our patience. Ye best wait {0} moments and we can talk again.
verification.error_other: Avast! We got confused: {0}. We can try that again.
verification.error_pending: Yer numbers be wrong. We can try that again.
verification.error_restart: Ye be trying our patience. Let's do this from the start. What be yer cabin's address?
verification.success: Yarr, we got ye in. Ye can hop aboard any ship ye see.
verification.text_body: Ye'll need to prove yer a real, one-of-a-kind pirate if ye want to join {0} so as we can make sure everyone has a good time flying the Jolly Roger. We be sure ye be a great pirate, but this step will help the Admirals get rid of any blaggards who send yer journeys to troubled waters. Real and ghost pirates can still hire their own ships.
verification.text_footer: We don't and can't know where yer cabin be.
verification.title: Makin' Sure Ye Be Real

attention.return: Go back to the Upper Deck!

firstnight.bluffs: Pick the three "Fool's Marks" to show the Beast o' the Sea.
firstnight.gardener_text: When ye be happy with yer picks, {0} to the crew. Once all the crew know their stations, ye can get ready to set sail.
firstnight.title: Get Ready to Set Sail

gatherplayers.clear_text: Are ye sure ye want to throw 'em all overboard?
gatherplayers.shuffle_text: Are ye sure ye want new bunkmates?
gatherplayers.text2: When the boat be big enough to fit yer crew, {0}
gatherplayers.title: Assemble Yer Crew
gatherplayers.warning: Ye need at least 7 mateys to crew a Galleon.

open-eyes.tooltip_false: Ye won't see what yer mateys do or be told, and ye can't whisper in the moonlight except to yer bunkmates and the Captain.
open-eyes.tooltip_open-eyes: Ye can haunt mateys across the ship and whisper in their ears under the moon. Ye'll know what everyone does and is told, but they might catch ye.
open-eyes.tooltip_peek-eyes: Ye can haunt the whole ship and whisper in yer matey's ears under the moon. Ye'll see who the Captain rouses, but ye'll never know what they told them. But they won't know ye be there.

pointing.prompt: Pick a matey to point yer finger!

reveal.prompt:
Avast! This will end yer journey and show the mateys the map!
Who prevailed?
reveal.text: Show who prevailed and each matey's station by picking their mark. Ye can peek at their station if ye need.
reveal.title: Show the Map

rules.text2: Bring yer landlubbers aboard afore picking stations.
rules.title: Pick Stations

towninfo.text_player: The Captain need to hire more mateys before ye can set sail.
towninfo.title: Welcome to {0}.

vote.highscore_text:
What be the most ayes?
Or say nothing to set the normal number.
vote.secret: Ye won't know who said aye.
vote.votes: {0} aye to tie, {1} to make 'em walk the plank|{0} ayes to tie, {1} to make 'em walk the plank
vote.warning_shortcuts: Ye can't use yer own knobs!

whisper.muted: This matey can't talk right now.
whisper.video_muted: This matey has covered their spyglass.

banned.description: Ye've been {0}, ye blaggard. Sling yer hook!
banned.expires: Ye've been marooned. We'll send a rescue ship on:
banned.expires2: If ye pull that again, we'll maroon ye forever.
banned.footer1: If ye need help, send a pigeon to {0}.
banned.footer3: Keep it cordial or I'll keelhaul the lot o' ye.
banned.title: Marooned

clock.description: Yer own timepiece be wrong by {0}. This will mayhap lead to problems. Ye can change yer timepiece {1} then come back.
clock.title: Change yer timepiece

lobby.bootlegger_warning:
This voyage be using the Bootlegger Great Tale o' the Sea, so it has bespoke rules or stations not blessed by the admiralty, so it be best for those with good sea legs.
If ye be new to flying the Jolly Roger, we suggest ye get used to the normal rules and stations first, on an admiralty-blessed sea. Storm's Comin' be a fine choice for yer first journeys.
At any rate, welcome aboard - we're glad ye're here!
Are ye sure ye want to hop aboard this vessel?
lobby.forced_private: Ye can't join a merchant ship.
lobby.free_tier_unverified: Ye be {0}. Ye can join any ship by picking the knob on the left so long as it be free. If ye want to launch yer own ship, hand over yer doubloons at {1}.
lobby.free_tier_verified: Ye be {0}. Ye need to {1} before ye can join a merchant ship. If ye want to launch yer own ship, hand over yer doubloons at {2}.

login.description: We'll need to know who ye be:
login.error_captcha: Yarr, can ye read this for me?
login.password_reset: We've sent ye a pigeon so ye can change yer code.
login.title: Yarr, welcome aboard the Jolly Roger! We'll be makin' a few improvements.

update.description: Ye be on run {0}, but we can get ye run {1}.
update.reload: Press the little circle arrow to be on the newest run.
update.title: Make sure the seas are on the newest run

verification.description: We've sent ye a carrier pigeon. Please tell us the digits it squawked at ye. Did it miss ye?
verification.error_disposable: Ye need a lasting home, or we can't send ye a pigeon.

menu.empty_text: Are ye sure ye want to get rid of this matey while the vessel be afloat?

name.connecting: This matey be trying to join the talking.
name.remove_text:
Do ye really want to get rid of Seat {0}?
Ye'd lose {1} too!

player.shroud_add: The mateys can't see that coffin. Ye'll need to make it again in daylight so's they can.
player.shroud_remove: The mateys can still see this coffin. Ye'll have to make it again in daylight so's they can't.

session.locked_text: Only the mateys and Captains aboard can get back aboard.
session.open_text: All be welcome aboard this vessel.
session.prompt_public_text:
Are ye sure ye want to announce this ship?
Then, anyone can come aboard.

storyteller.connecting: The Captain be trying to join yer talkin'.
storyteller.prompt_grim_text:
Greenhorns can't see the map if the game be announced.
Please sail on more voyages to do that.
storyteller.prompt_grim_title: Ye couldn't ask to see the map
storyteller.title: Captains

npcs.remove_loric: Dismiss Great Tale o' the Sea
npcs.title: Legends

system.end_evil: The ship has come in to port and the bad'uns have prevailed!
system.end_good: The ship has come in to port and the good'uns have prevailed!
system.start: We left port and stations were assigned!

user.error_avatar_text: Yer portrait be worth {0} thousand bites o' booty, but the most we can afford be {1} thousand bites o' booty.

stats.warning:
Record bein' written
See ye soon!

version.download: Get the latest copy o' {0} here.
version.reload: Come back again to get the latest copy.
version.translation_disclaimer: Ye be speakin' the language of the sea. It be made and maintained by these scallywags, who don't be representin' the admiralty:
version.translation_game: The Pirate version o' Jolly Rodger mayhaps isn't quite the version ye know, as written by The Pandemonium Institute.
version.warning_browser: Yer cabin be creaky and needin' updating
version.warning_browser2: {0}, which mayhaps means ye can't fly the Jolly Roger. Do it up or get a new one. We suggest ye get a firey fox or polished iron.
version.warning_update: Yer copy o' the Jolly Roger be too old
